pages.text: Souls are used in both the $(l:forging/hephaestus_forge)Hephaestus Forge$() and the $(l:forging/clibano)Clibano$(). Souls and Corrupt Souls have a value of 1 and Enchanted Souls have a value of 10 in the Hephaestus Forge, and Souls, Corrupt Souls and Enchanted Souls make the Clibano faster and produce more residue, where Enchanted Souls are the fastest.
Hold Right Click on Soul Sand to steal its soul, or on Lost Souls throughout the world. All Lost Souls can only take damage from the Soul Extractor
Harvested from Soul Sand or found naturally spawning around the world.
Occasionally killing a mob will spawn a blue Lost Soul which will run away from you. Use the Soul Extractor on it to obtain a Corrupt Soul.
Found very rarely around the world, but can also be obtained by throwing a Splash Aureal Bottle onto a Lost Soul
